pasal wiye patanma ragbi, papandu ki්rada kerehi wishesha dakshatha penwiya.pasal yugaya nima kirimen anathuruwa 1960 shi්ra lanka yuda hamudawata ek wiya.1990 di mejar jenaralwarayeku wu mohu 1992 di luthinan jenaral dakwa usaswim labiya.1991 di alimankada kotinge muda ganime satane niyamuwa wiya. 1985 aandanmpan meheyumedi da ohu wishishta dakshatha penwiya.yapanaya koti grahanayen mudawa ganima sandaha "jayakirthi" meheyume salasum sakas karamin sitiyadi 1992 agosthu 08 da arali thuduwedi koti bim bombayakata hasuwa jiwithaya puda kaleya.kobbakaduwa wiruwa samaga mejar jenaral wijaya wimalarathna, riyar admiral mohan jayamaha, luthinan karnal stefan, luthinan karnal aariyarathna, luthinan karnal palipana, kamandar asanga lankathilaka, mejar nalin alwis, luthinan kamandar wijepura saha sebala wikramasinha yana wiruwanda ema sthanaye rata wenuwen diwi piduha.ohuge maranayath samaga noyek parshawayan wetha chodana ella wiya.
